page.title: 10The Village Post Office
page.content: There is a Village Post Office in Tollerton.In the same building there is a shop.The person who runs the Post Office manages the shop.Qualifications are not needed to work in a Post Office .The present Postmistress has been there since 1983.The Post Office is open seven and a half hours each day Monday to Friday and also on Saturday morning.Our Post Office provides all the usual services available at village Post Offices. These include selling Postal Orders, licences of various kinds,premium bonds and saving stamps.People can also draw pensions,family allowances and even pay routine bills. The Village Postwoman is employed by the General Post Office in York . If the Postwoman is ill or away she asks another person to do her job for her.The Postlady delivers letters on.
